DOC.brief_summary: The present trial design assess safety efficacy TNX-102 SL 2.8 mg tablet , take daily bedtime 12 week treatment patient fibromyalgia . The use low-dose sublingual formulation cyclobenzaprine ( TNX-102 SL ) dose nightly fibromyalgia support result TNX-CY-F202 Phase 2b study -- result provide strong evidence TNX-102 SL 2.8 mg dose nightly result beneficial effect upon pain , sleep FM symptomatology .
DOC.brief_title: Repeat : A Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety Sublingual TNX-102 SL Tablet Taken Bedtime Patients With Fibromyalgia
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis Primary Fibromyalgia ( 2010 ACR criterion ) Male female 1875 year old Patients currently receive pharmacologic treatment depression clinically stable least 3 month prior randomization , stable dos antidepressant 3 month time frame . Willing able withdraw specific therapy ( ask PI ) If female , medically acceptable form contraception child bear potential . Provide write informed consent participate . Willing able comply protocol specify requirement . Arthritis , lupus systemic autoimmune diseases Regional persistent pain could interfere assessment fibromyalgia pain Bipolar psychotic disorder Increased risk suicide Significant clinical ( cardiac , systemic infection , systemic corticosteroid requirement , drug/alcohol abuse ) laboratory abnormality . Inability washout specific medication ( ask PI ) Known hypersensitivity cyclobenzaprine Others : seizure disorder , severe/untreated sleep apnea , BMI > 45
